title: Artificial intelligence based personalized student feedback system -Sisu Athwala’ to enhance exam performance of medical undergraduates
description: Background In medical education, mentoring and feedback play crucial roles. Providing feedback on exam performance is a vital component as it allows students to improve. Feedback has to be tailor made and specific to the individual student. This needs lot of …
